TextBlock.Text: ALNUS: I wanted to warn everyone that, according to our teacher, a highly hazardous and invisible substance has been spilled in this cave, so please avoid it
ALNUS: Fortunately, it seems that the substance can be temporarily neutralized with water, so if anyone accidentally touches it we can use that to our advantage.
ADONSONIA: What an interesting property, I wonder if we can use that to somehow gain access to this cave...
BETULA: I don’t believe that to be advisable Adonsonia, somebody could be seriously hurt trying to do that.
BETULA: With this material and the gravity, LARGE_PLANET_NAME may be the most dangerous planet in this system.
ADONSONIA: I believe that you mean that it’s the most interesting planet. It’s a shame that Daucus chose to name this planet and gave it... that name of all things.
DAUCUS: LARGE_PLANET_NAME is a perfectly serviceable name, it informs us of exactly what we need to know.
